TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract sealed beforefieldinit XamlWriter extends System.Object
public ref class XamlWriter abstract sealed

summary.span: 提供一个静态 方法（多次重载），该方法可用于以受限的 XAML 序列化方式，将所提供的运行时对象序列化为 XAML 标记。

span.span: Provides a single static method (multiple overloads) that can be used for limited XAML serialization of provided run-time objects into XAML markup.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法启用的序列化具有一系列限制。The serialization enabled by this method has a series of limitations. 这是因为启用序列化的是显式运行时，如果有任何) ，则无法访问原始 XAML (中可能的设计时信息。This is because the serialization enabled is explicitly run-time, and does not have access to possible design-time information in the original XAML (if any). 有关详细信息，请参阅 [system.windows.markup.xamlwriter.save 的序列化限制](/dotnet/framework/wpf/advanced/serialization-limitations-of-xamlwriter-save)。For details, see [Serialization Limitations of XamlWriter.Save](/dotnet/framework/wpf/advanced/serialization-limitations-of-xamlwriter-save). 在部分信任环境中运行时，不允许调用。Calling is not permitted when running in partial trust. 这包括从 Xbap。This includes from XBAPs. ## Examples 下面的示例使用类将序列化为 字符串 。The following example serializes a into a string using the class. 然后， 使用类上的静态方法，将字符串反序列化为 。The string is then deserialized back into a using the static method on the class. [!code-csharp[XamlReaderWriterSnippets#XamlReaderLoadXmlReader](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/XamlReaderWriterSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#xamlreaderloadxmlreader)] [!code-vb[XamlReaderWriterSnippets#XamlReaderLoadXmlReader](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/XamlReaderWriterSnippets/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#xamlreaderloadxmlreader)]

summary.span: 直接或通过用于序列化指定对象的中间对象返回 XAML。

span.span: Returns XAML either directly or through an object intermediary that serializes the specified object.

span.span: The element to be serialized.

param.span: 通常，这是页面或应用程序的根元素。

span.span: Typically, this is the root element of a page or application.

summary.span: 返回用于序列化指定对象及其属性的 XAML 字符串。

span.span: Returns a XAML string that serializes the specified object and its properties.

returns.span: 可以写入流或文件的 XAML 字符串。

span.span: A XAML string that can be written to a stream or file.

returns.span: 将序列化位于提供的 元素下面的所有元素的逻辑树。

span.span: The logical tree of all elements that fall under the provided element will be serialized.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法启用的序列化具有一系列限制。The serialization enabled by this method has a series of limitations. 这是因为启用序列化的是显式运行时，如果有任何) ，则无法访问原始 XAML (中可能的设计时信息。This is because the serialization enabled is explicitly run-time, and does not have access to possible design-time information in the original XAML (if any). 有关详细信息，请参阅 [system.windows.markup.xamlwriter.save 的序列化限制](/dotnet/framework/wpf/advanced/serialization-limitations-of-xamlwriter-save)。For details, see [Serialization Limitations of XamlWriter.Save](/dotnet/framework/wpf/advanced/serialization-limitations-of-xamlwriter-save). 在部分信任环境中运行时，不允许调用。Calling is not permitted when running in partial trust. ## Examples 下面的示例使用类将序列化为 字符串 。The following example serializes a into a string using the class. 然后， 使用类上的静态方法，将字符串反序列化为 。The string is then deserialized back into a using the static method on the class. remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法启用的序列化具有一系列限制。The serialization enabled by this method has a series of limitations. 这是因为启用序列化的是显式运行时，如果有任何) ，则无法访问原始 XAML (中可能的设计时信息。This is because the serialization enabled is explicitly run-time, and does not have access to possible design-time information in the original XAML (if any). 有关详细信息，请参阅 [system.windows.markup.xamlwriter.save 的序列化限制](/dotnet/framework/wpf/advanced/serialization-limitations-of-xamlwriter-save)。For details, see [Serialization Limitations of XamlWriter.Save](/dotnet/framework/wpf/advanced/serialization-limitations-of-xamlwriter-save). 在部分信任环境中运行时，不允许调用。Calling is not permitted when running in partial trust. ## Examples 下面的示例使用类将序列化 到中 。The following example serializes a into a using the class. 然后， 使用类上的静态方法将流反序列化为 。The stream is then deserialized back into a using the static method on the class. [!code-csharp[XamlReaderWriterSnippets#XamlReaderLoadXmlReader](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/XamlReaderWriterSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#xamlreaderloadxmlreader)] [!code-vb[XamlReaderWriterSnippets#XamlReaderLoadXmlReader](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/XamlReaderWriterSnippets/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#xamlreaderloadxmlreader)]
